WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
 
I have CAL WPF client application which worked well with local database through ADO.Net Data Service WITHOUT any authentication feature enabled. But now I am suppose to work with Remote ADO.Net Data Service which needs Forms Authentication. I developed sample WPF application which worked fine. (referred : http://www.garrardkitchen.com/2009/09/forms-authentication-wpf/ )
 
But I am looking for the standard way to incorporate these into my CAL application. 
 
Regards,
Smitha
WorkItem.Summary: CAL with ADO.Net Data Service and Client Forms Authentication

Comments.Message:
Hi Smitha,
As of the current version of Prism, there is no guidance on how to integrate composite applications with external data sources. However, you might find this thread useful, in which some possible approaches for doing so are explored:
http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=241013
Hope this helps.

Hi,

Additionally, for those who are concerned with this subject, I believe that you might also find the following blog post useful, which deals with authentication and role based authorization in Prism (using shared services):

http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi/2011/10/authentication-and-role-based-authorization-in-prism-v4/

Regards,

Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami﻿
